\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_formula}{XLFormula}} class encapsulates the concept of an Excel formula. The class is essentially a wrapper around a std\+::string. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
This class currently only supports simple formulas. Array formulas and shared formulas are not supported. Unfortunately, many spreadsheets have shared formulas, so this class is probably best used for adding formulas, not reading them from an existing spreadsheet. 
\end{DoxyWarning}
\begin{DoxyRefDesc}{Todo}
\item[\mbox{\hyperlink{todo__todo000003}{Todo}}]Enable handling of shared and array formulas. \end{DoxyRefDesc}
